Name: Codey's Bootcamp
Description: Put your fitness to the test with a week long bootcamp. Compete against similarly active members of the Astro's Gym community for the ultimate prize - a lifesize Codey. There are no fitness level requirements, just a willingness to push your limits.

Name: Cloudy's Community Get Together
Description: Participate with gym members and the broader community in a beach clean-up and group fitness class that will unite the city around active lifestyles. Food and entertainment will be provided all day!

Name: Appy's Active Kids Camp
Description: Active lifestyles start with kids learning the right behaviours and mindsets when it comes to physical activity. This camp is set up to be a week of fun while also creating a spirit of active living. Ages 7-13 recommended, all fitness levels welcome.

Name: Astro's Gym Fall Open House
Description: Fall brings a return to school, and also a return to the gym. Come check out the facilities and meet our personal training staff to learn more about how to build a routine for the last third of the year.
